document.full_text: maria sharapova beat sam stosur 6-2, 6-4 in the italian open final sunday for the biggest clay-court title of her career.
document.title: sharapova tunes up for french open with big win in rome
lines_and_colors: maria sharapova beat sam stosur 6-2, 6-4 in the italian open final sunday for the biggest clay-court title of her career.
